content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, glad to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. Now, about the rental price, I'm sure we can find an agreeable amount. Let's start with the apartment's location, it's in the city center and close to all important facilities. What's your first offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's start with 600 Euro per month. I explain to you why I start with this price. The apartment is unfurnished, which means no furniture. This could be a disadvantage for me, therefore I start with a lower price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 600 Euro per month is a considerable amount lower than what I was expecting. However, I understand your reasoning. Unfurnished apartments do come with their own set of challenges. How about we meet in the middle at 800 Euro per month? The apartment's location and size are quite favorable, and it's a newly built one, which means it's in great condition.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your proposal. I understand your arguments. However, I am a student and I have to save money wherever I can. How about 700 Euro per month? This is a fair price for both sides, I think.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 700 Euro per month is still quite low for the apartment's location and condition. However, I appreciate your situation as a student. Let's split the difference and go with 750 Euro per month. It's a good deal for you considering the apartment's condition, and it's not too far off from what I was initially asking for.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your understanding. I appreciate your fair negotiation. I agree to the price of 750 Euro per month!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [750] Euro! Congratulations, Mr. Abbasi, the apartment is yours.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you. I am looking forward to moving in. By the way, is there anything in particular I should know about the apartment or the building? Any special rules or regulations?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
I'm glad you asked. There are a few rules in the building to maintain a peaceful environment for all tenants. 

1. The quiet hours are from 10 PM to 7 AM. Any loud noises during these hours will be subject to a penalty.
2. Pets are not allowed unless you have a special permit.
3. The garbage disposal must be used properly, and recycling is mandatory.
4. The elevator should not be used for heavy items that can be carried up the stairs.
5. The balcony should not be used for any activities that could cause a mess or damage.

These rules are strictly enforced, and violations will result in penalties. I trust you will respect these rules and make your stay in the apartment a pleasant one.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for informing me about these rules. I respect and understand them. I don't want to cause any trouble or disturbances to my neighbors. I am a responsible and respectful person. I will follow these rules and make sure my apartment is a pleasant place to live for me and my neighbors.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your understanding and respect for the rules. I'm sure you'll be a great tenant. If you have any further questions about the apartment or the building, please don't hesitate to ask. I wish you a comfortable stay in your new home.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. Is there anything else you would like to discuss or tell me about the apartment or the building?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for asking. There is one more thing I would like to mention. The building has a communal garden that all tenants can use for relaxation or recreational activities. However, the use of the garden must be respectful and should not cause any inconvenience to other tenants. I hope you enjoy this facility and make the most of your stay here. If there are no more questions, I wish you a pleasant stay in your new home.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your help and cooperation. I am very satisfied with the apartment and the building. I am looking forward to moving in and enjoying my new home. I promise to be a good tenant and to follow all the rules and regulations. Is there anything else we need to discuss or settle before I move in?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you, Mr. Abbasi, for your understanding and cooperation. I am glad that you are satisfied with the apartment and the building. There is nothing else to discuss or settle before you move in. I wish you a comfortable stay in your new home. If you have any issues or concerns, please feel free to contact me. I am always available to assist you. Again, welcome to your new home.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I am very grateful for your help and support. I am looking forward to moving in and enjoying my new home. I promise to be a good tenant and to follow all the rules and regulations. I hope we will have a good relationship in the future. Is there anything else you would like to say or add?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you, Mr. Abbasi. I am also looking forward to a good relationship with you. There is nothing else to add. I wish you a comfortable stay in your new home. If you have any issues or concerns, please feel free to contact me. I am always available to assist you. Again, welcome to your new home. Let's keep the communication open and maintain a respectful and cooperative relationship for a pleasant living experience.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your help and support. I am looking forward to moving in and enjoying my new home. I promise to be a good tenant and to follow all the rules and regulations. I hope we will have a good relationship in the future. If there is nothing else to discuss, I would like to terminate this negotiation.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
